name: Spirit of Vengeance
description:
Use ghostly powers and explore a small world in this game for Miz Jam 1.

Stuck? Just remember: farmers hate having a pest problem.

Controls
Right Mouse Button - Move
Q and E - Switch spells
Enter - Cast spell
Space - Continue in menus

Dev Info
This was made in 7-ish days and took around 34 hours. I used GMS2 and Kenney's art pack.

I recommend playing the Windows version if possible, it's been tested more than the HTML5 version.
